tweet.text: How did Secretary of State George Shultz use his golf game to talk with Soviet Foreign Minister Eduard Shevardnadze about “deep cuts” in nuclear weapons? Hit the green in #FRUS: https://t.co/vSsZyIDoKQ https://t.co/UvkdSoJSGH
